snippet.title: Demonlore – Expansion Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Demonlore on Steam! The exciting new Demonlore rogue-lite expansion is live now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1588340/Riftbound/?utm_source=yt_dllaunch... This free content update brings a huge amount of content, new mechanics and improvements, including 6 playable characters, mini-boss enemies and 10 different roguelite runs.

P.S. This is a FREE expansion to the base game. Enjoy!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1588340/Riftbound/?utm_source=yt_dllaunch

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Follow us and chat with the devs on Discord!
Discord: https://discord.gg/4Xz6qNpwH5
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#Riftbound #Gaming #indiegame
